# This file was autogenerated by the Agenda framework generator. Do not edit this file manually.

bpm_iga_institutional_exploitation_agenda_effect = {
    # Do stuff every agenda tick
}
bpm_iga_ideological_grifting_agenda_effect = {
    # Do stuff every agenda tick
}



bpm_iga_ideological_grifting_on_activate = {
    # Do stuff on agenda activation
}

bpm_agenda_picker = {
    set_variable = {
        name = bpm_agenda_category_random_number
        value = {
            integer_range = {
                min = 0
                max = 100
            }
        }
    }
    set_variable = {
        name = bpm_agenda_category_weight_running_total
        value = 0
    }
    change_variable = {
        name = bpm_agenda_category_weight_running_total
        add = bpm_agenda_exploitation_category_weight_normalized
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            var:bpm_agenda_category_random_number <= var:bpm_agenda_category_weight_running_total
            NOT = {
                has_variable = bpm_agenda_picker_ifelse_ended
            }
        }
        bpm_agenda_exploitation_category_picker = yes
        set_variable = bpm_agenda_picker_ifelse_ended
    }
}

bpm_agenda_exploitation_category_picker = {
    set_variable = {
        name = bpm_agenda_category_random_number
        value = {
            integer_range = {
                min = 0
                max = 100
            }
        }
    }
    set_variable = {
        name = bpm_agenda_category_weight_running_total
        value = 0
    }
    remove_variable = bpm_agenda_picker_ifelse_ended
    change_variable = {
        name = bpm_agenda_category_weight_running_total
        add = bpm_agenda_institutional_exploitation_weight_normalized
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            var:bpm_agenda_category_random_number <= var:bpm_agenda_category_weight_running_total
            NOT = {
                has_variable = bpm_agenda_picker_ifelse_ended
            }
            bpm_iga_institutional_exploitation_possible_trigger = yes
        }
        bpm_add_agenda = {
            id = bpm_agenda_institutional_exploitation_id
        }
        set_variable = bpm_agenda_picker_ifelse_ended
    }
    change_variable = {
        name = bpm_agenda_category_weight_running_total
        add = bpm_agenda_ideological_grifting_weight_normalized
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            var:bpm_agenda_category_random_number <= var:bpm_agenda_category_weight_running_total
            NOT = {
                has_variable = bpm_agenda_picker_ifelse_ended
            }
            bpm_iga_ideological_grifting_possible_trigger = yes
        }
        bpm_iga_ideological_grifting_on_activate = yes
        bpm_add_agenda = {
            id = bpm_agenda_ideological_grifting_id
        }
        set_variable = bpm_agenda_picker_ifelse_ended
    }
}
